Description: Man's coat (aba) woven in two sections, joined horizontally, from natural and brown wool. Sleeveless, open at front wiht embroidery around opening and at back of neck in cotton thread. Futher herringbone stitching along top of shoulders and at midway seam. Single tassel at either side at lower armhole of brown wool.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine
